snippet: “I say exactly what I think,” Ed Koch told reporters as mayor. He never stopped saying it, even as his subjects shifted from union leaders to romantic comedies.
abstract: Former New York City Mayor Ed Koch, never one to withhold opinions, wrote movie reviews for Manhattan publications and posted video reviews on his Web site after leaving City Hall.
lead_paragraph: “I say exactly what I think,” Ed Koch told reporters as mayor. He never stopped saying it, even as his subjects shifted from union leaders to romantic comedies.

headline.seo: Movie Reviews From Former Mayor Ed Koch
